name: Sticky Diagnosis
description:
Sticky Diagnosis

While enjoying a football match with a cold beer in your trailer you felt a strange pain in your throat. Maybe a doctor should have a look at it?

Explore the depths of your mouth by moving the tongue depressor around. Buy upgrades to be able to kill more bacteria and go deeper and deeper!

Controls:

[W] [A] [S][D] :   Move tongue depressor left/right/up/down. In game and menu.

[Left Mouse Click]:  Click in menu.

Created by:

Martin Beyrle (made3) - coder, designer

Pascal Plewa (zombree) - coder

Cephalo - composer

Game was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48. 

Theme: Deeper and deeper
